courseSectionInformation: May be repeated to a maximum of 2 hours.  Prerequisite: Major standing in Dance, or consent of instructor
description: Introduction to basic tap technique for experienced dancers. Emphasis on a conceptual understanding of tap style and the development of the specific skills necessary for performance and teaching. May be repeated to a maximum of 2 hours.  Prerequisite: Major standing in Dance, or consent of instructor
label: Int Tap Dance Technique
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to Dance or Dance major(s).
